data.content:
Last week, MC Solutions held an internal seminar with full participation from our development team. Under the guidance of Mr. Hieu Dang - Senior Python Developer, team members delved into advanced methodologies aimed at enhancing the software development process.
 The seminar provided us with a deeper understanding of the importance of designing systems in a scientific and methodical manner. New standards and effective approaches were introduced, offering a valuable perspective on optimizing workflows and improving the quality of the final product.
 In addition, real-world scenarios commonly encountered by the team were brought up for discussion, with specific solutions shared to equip everyone with the necessary skills to handle tasks more efficiently.
 We believe that with these new insights and skills, our development team will become even stronger and more prepared to face any challenges on our journey to creating top-tier technology solutions! ğŸš€
 #MCSolutions #greenbusiness #internalseminar

It was our great honor to welcome a special guest, Mr. Kato, General Manager of our parent company tanso-manGX to visit and work at our office for a few days, this week! ğŸ¢ This visit not only highlights the solid relationship but also reaffirms the close internal operating processes between tanso-manGX and MC Solutions.
During the visit, MC Solutions and Mr. Kato had a warm and meaningful meeting. This meeting provided an opportunity for both sides to share experiences, discuss, and propose innovative ideas, contributing to the new development plan and management processes for the future in both countries, from Vietnam to Japan ğŸ¤
We eagerly look forward to future collaborative projects and will update more in the coming posts! ğŸ¥³
